name: Ctrl, Alt, Del
description:
Voice coming from the keyboard production line: "Dave! You're not gonna believe this...we're out of Ctrl!"

Meet Ctrl, our key protagonist, who having escaped the keyboard production line must now sneak their way through perilous assembly floors to survive, hiding from the factory's guards and attempting to rescue their friends along the way.

Source code: https://github.com/dhog10/gmtk2020
